word_mean: 核仁：在大多数细胞核内的一种圆形折光体，是核糖体RNA的合成部分
在合成时期变大，在静止期变小。有一个混合的颗粒部和纤丝部。有些细胞内含有多个核仁

sentence.Network_en: Chromosomes 6 and 7 were both nucleolus organizing chromosomes.
sentence.Network_cn: 第6和第7染色体两者是组成核仁的染色体.

sentence.Network_en: At the onset of mitosis, prophase, the nucleolus breaks down.
sentence.Network_cn: 有丝分裂的开始称为前期, 核仁消失.

sentence.Network_en: If you sway grape, you could listen nucleolus sways the sound.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果你摇晃它, 你能听到核仁的声音哦.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 核仁(Nucleolus)——是真核细胞间期核中最明显的结构。它位于细胞核中。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from late Latin, diminutive of Latin nucleus 'inner part, kernel' (see nucleus)

means.word_mean: 1. a small round body of protein in a cell nucleus; nucleoli contain RNA and are involved in protein synthesis
